questions.question: Will you check my answers for me?

choices.answer: Mom wrote a check for the fieldtrip.
I will check and see if the cat is in the house.
If you get a check it means the answer is wrong.

questions.question: Will you show me how to bake a pie?

choices.answer: I want to show you my new toy.
I went to the show with dad.
My favorite television show is on tonight.

questions.question: Mom put money into her bank account.

choices.answer: A teller works at a bank.
The river had a very high bank.

questions.question: Mary likes to come to my house and play with me.

choices.answer: He starred in our class play.
I like to play checkers.
My favorite play is "My Fair Lady."
I can do it by myself.
Can you help me do the dishes?
Mom gave me a can of peanuts for the party.
Please sign your name on the paper.
Can you sign the word cat?
I read the sign on the wall.
Did you watch me jump rope?
My watch is lost.
I don't watch many television shows!

questions.question: I always receive good marks in school.

choices.answer: The marks on my report card were great!
My fingers left marks on the glass.
I have marks on my clothes where the milk spilled on them.
She will order me a hamburger for lunch.
Please put the numbers in order.
I filled out the order form for my dad.

questions.question: Please don't jam your papers into your desk.

choices.answer: The band is going to have a jam session.
I like to put jam on my toast.
My sister likes to jam things into her backpack.

questions.question: There are five pigs in the pen.

choices.answer: My teacher uses a red pen to correct our papers.
The dogs ran back and forth in their pens.
The pen dripped blue ink all over my new shirt.

questions.question: I lost my ring in the grass.

choices.answer: I didn't hear the phone ring.
Please draw a ring around the correct answer.
My mother has a beautiful wedding ring.

questions.question: This was a fine piece of film.

choices.answer: The barber prefers to use a fine tooth comb.
Yesterday I paid my fine for the parking ticket.
My grandmother brought out the fine china for our guests.

questions.question: I bought green and blue curtains to match the bed.

choices.answer: Let's light a match for those candles.
The soccer match was cancelled due to rain.
Those shoes make a great match for this outfit.

questions.question: The boat began to rock as the waves crashed against it.

choices.answer: My favorite road trip songs are classic rock.
This rock looks like it has a fossil in it.
You can rock the cradle to help the baby fall asleep.
